page.title: 06EDUCATION IN CASTLETON
page.content: Castleton has a school called Castleton C.E. Primary school.It is 122 years old,still has a bell tower and outside toilets.It has 58 pupils 3 teachers and 1 secretary.Class2 have a seperate classroom down the road .We also have recorder and computer club after school.Our school has a television,a video recorder,a film strip projector,2 tape recorders,a radio,percussion instruments .Down at the village hall we have a climbing frame ,some balancing beams,some hoops and balls and jumps,for P.E. School dinners are cooked on class 2 premises.We have 2 dinner supervisors, our school has gas central heating.In 1982 our school was nearly closed down because county thought there wouldnt be enough pupils.We have sports days,swimming galas with other schools in the Hope Valley.
